vote.text: Amendment SA 3460 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3460 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S1409; text: CR S1409) To amend the preamble.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3460 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
